description.value:
Trigger You roll a success on a saving throw against an effect that would make you @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Fascinated]{Fascinated} or @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Dazzled]{Dazzled}.

Your mind retains full awareness despite the best attempts of others, and your focus throws others off-balance. You get a critical success on the triggering saving throw, and if the triggering effect was caused by a creature, that creature is @UUID[Compendium.pf2e.conditionitems.Flat-Footed]{Flat-Footed} to you until the end of your next turn.
